item.title: Your Smartphone Business Office
item.description: Microelectronics have brought us the era of the portable office, enabling employees and independent professionals to work from anywhere. This freedom is thanks to the smartphone, which combines a cell phone and a computer. While each uses its own wireless network, they work together to support your work. Voice communication happens through the cell phone. Many professionals use Bluetooth headsets, not just to free their hands but also to view the screen and utilize apps while talking.
